head.title: The Manhattan Meetings, Uptown and Down

hedline.hl1: The Manhattan Meetings, Uptown and Down

block.p: DISTRICT 1: Battery Park, Civic Center, Financial District, South Street Seaport, TriBeCa; third Tuesday of the month; next meeting June 20, 5:30 p.m.; Southbridge Towers, 90 Beekman Street. Board chairwoman: Anne Compoccia. District manager: Paul Goldstein. (212) 442-5050.

DISTRICT 2: Greenwich Village, Little Italy, NoHo, SoHo, West Village, Hudson Square; next to last Thursday of the month; next meeting June 22, 7 p.m.; St. Vincent's Hospital, 170 West 12th Street (Seventh Avenue), Cronin Auditorium, 10th floor. Board chairman: Jim Smith. District manger: Arthur Strickler. (212) 979-2272.

DISTRICT 1: Battery Park, Civic Center, Financial District, South Street Seaport, TriBeCa; third Tuesday of the month; next meeting June 20, 5:30 p.m.; Southbridge Towers, 90 Beekman Street. Board chairwoman: Anne Compoccia. District manager: Paul Goldstein. (212) 442-5050.

DISTRICT 2: Greenwich Village, Little Italy, NoHo, SoHo, West Village, Hudson Square; next to last Thursday of the month; next meeting June 22, 7 p.m.; St. Vincent's Hospital, 170 West 12th Street (Seventh Avenue), Cronin Auditorium, 10th floor. Board chairman: Jim Smith. District manger: Arthur Strickler. (212) 979-2272.

DISTRICT 3: Chinatown, East Village, Lower East Side; meeting is usually the last Tuesday of the month; but the next meeting is June 20, 6:30 p.m.; P.S. 20, 166 Essex Street, between East Houston and Stanton Streets. Acting board chairman: Morris Faitelewicz. District manager: Martha Danziger. (212) 533-5300.

DISTRICT 4: Chelsea, Clinton; meeting is usually the first Wednesday of the month; but next meeting is July 26, 6 p.m.; St. Luke's-Roosevelt Hospital Center, 1000 10th Avenue (58th and 59th Streets), second-floor conference room. Board chairwoman: Katherine Gray. Acting district manager: Maggie Nachlin. (212) 736-4536.

DISTRICT 5: Central Park South, Central Business District, Theater District, Gramercy, Clinton, Union Square, Rose Hill, Little India, Rockefeller Center; second Thursday of the month; but the next meeting is July 13, 6 p.m.; Fashion Institute of Technology, Building A at 27th Street and Eighth Avenue (eighth floor). Board chairwoman: Lola Finkelstein. District manager: Kathy Kinsella. (212) 465-0907.

DISTRICT 6: Murray Hill, Turtle Bay, Stuyvesant Square, Gramercy Park, Peter Cooper Village, Beekman, Sutton; second Wednesday of the month; next meeting Wednesday 7 p.m.; New York University Medical Center, Classroom A, 550 First Avenue, at 30th Street. Board chairman: Martin J. Barrett. District manager: Carol A. Pieper. (212) 679-0907.

DISTRICT 7: Upper West Side; meeting is usually the first Tuesday of the month; but the next meeting is July 5, 7 p.m.; Fordham University, 113 West 60th Street. Board chairman: Eric M. Nelson. District manager: Penny Ryan. (212) 362-4008.

DISTRICT 8: Upper East Side, Roosevelt Island; third Wednesday of the month; next meeting June 21, 7 p.m.; New York Blood Center, 310 East 67th Street, between First and Second Avenues. Board chairman: M. Barry Schneider. District manager: Victoria Caramante. (212) 758-4340.

DISTRICT 9: Morningside Heights, Manhattanville, Hamilton Heights; third Thursday of the month; next meeting Thursday, 6:30 p.m.; board office, 565 West 125th Street, between Broadway and Old Broadway. Board chairman: George Goodwill. District manager: Lawrence McLean. (212) 864-6200.

DISTRICT 10: Central Harlem; first Wednesday of the month; next meeting July 5, 6 p.m.; Adam Clayton Powell State Office Building, 163 West 125th Street, second-floor art gallery. Board chairman: Stanley Gleaton. District manager: Richard Harley. (212) 749-3105.
DISTRICT 11: East Harlem; meeting is usually the third Tuesday of the month; information on next meeting not available. (212) 831-8929.

DISTRICT 12: Washington Heights and Inwood; fourth Tuesday of the month; next meeting June 27, 7 p.m.; Mount Sinai Jewish Center, 135 Bennett Avenue, Corner of 187th Street. Board chairman: William Garcia. District manager: Gregoria Feliciano. (212) 568-8500.
